projects.title: Advanced Power Estimation using Traditional ML and Physics-Informed Neural Networks
projects.bodyText:
- Utilized Physics-Informed Neural Networks for thermal modeling.
 - Implemented RNN, LSTM, GRU for sequence learning.
 - Processed five-minute interval weather data using Energy plus.
 - Estimated energy consumption in multi-zone commercial buildings.
 - Presented findings at WSU Advanced Grid Institute 2024.
 - Achieved power utilization prediction accuracy of 92.3%.

projects.title: Crypto Intelligence Chatbot – VesterAI (Capstone)
projects.bodyText:
- Built RAG chatbot using FastAPI and LangChain.
- Integrated GPT-4 and Deepseek for intelligence.
- Stored knowledge embeddings using pgvector index.
- Designed Airflow pipelines with Docker containers.
- Reduced ETL latency by 60% overall.
- Created Plotly dashboards for crypto insights.
- Increased user onboarding confidence by 40%.
- Added caching and prompt latency profiling.
- Processed 3 years of crypto market data.
- Evaluated prompts with custom metric logs.

projects.title: Gender Gap Analytics – Dooit (Experiential Learning)
projects.bodyText:
- Analyzed OpenPayments using PySpark pipelines.
- Applied KMeans and DBSCAN clustering algorithms.
- Used Isolation Forest for anomaly detection.
- Found 43% gender gap reduction pattern.
- Automated SQL pipelines with Airflow framework.
- Validated models using silhouette score metrics.
- Conducted cross-validation to improve accuracy.
- Improved insights precision by 35% overall.
